items.title: InDrive has big plans to become a global ‘super app’ where others have failed
items.description: InDrive plans to expand into multiple verticals over the next 12 months across its top markets, starting with grocery deliveries in Kazakhstan.

items.title: Uber and Momenta to test autonomous vehicles in Germany in 2026
items.description: Momenta is one of 20 global AV partners that Uber has scooped up across its ridehail, delivery, and freight businesses. Uber says those partnerships h...

items.title: Microsoft says Azure affected after cables cut in the Red Sea
items.description: It's not clear who cut the cables or why.

items.title: Are bad incentives to blame for AI hallucinations?
items.description: How can a chatbot be so wrong — and sound so confident in its wrongness?

items.title: Koah raises $5M to bring ads into AI apps
items.description: One investor says Koah is "building the essential monetization layer for consumer AI."
